name: D2W Rule
content:
100: ((entity.name = 'EntityName') and (propertyKey = 'propertyKey') and task = 'task') => componentName = "ComponentName"  [ com.webobjects.directtoweb.Assignment]

group(1) = priority
group(2) = LHS
group(3) + group(4) + group(5) = RHS
group(3) = key
group(4) = value
group(5) = assignment class
author: Farrukh Ijaz
